data.Name: Ghosts of Glaciers
data.Bio: Ghosts Of Glaciers is an instrumental, post-rock, post-metal band from Littleton and Englewood, Colorado. They released their self-titled debut album in July of 2012, which is available, name your price, @ http://ghostsofglaciers.bandcamp.com/ For more information, visit:https://www.facebook.com/GhostsofGlaciers Members: Steven Jackson-Guitar Ben Brandhorst-Drums Michael Rouse-Bass Read more on Last.fm
